content:
/>
Introduction
This topic contains information on jurisdiction and procedures for CUE determinations, including
determining a case of CUE
jurisdiction for review of a CUE allegation
applying the benefit of the doubt under
38 U.S.C. 5107(b)
approval of ratings prepared under 38 CFR 3.105(a)
preparing a CUE decision
, and
tracking Compensation CUE decisions in the CUE log
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 5, Section A - Revision Due to Clear and Unmistakable Error (CUE)
citation: Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 5, Section A
